content:
RepairScopeIdentifierKind RepairScopeIdentifierKind Enum

In this Article

Edit

Specifies the kind of the RepairScopeIdentifier.

This type supports the Service Fabric platform; it is not meant to be used directly from your code.

Syntax

Declaration

public enum RepairScopeIdentifierKindPublic Enum RepairScopeIdentifierKind

Fields

Cluster
Cluster

The repair scope identifier represents the entire cluster.
Invalid
Invalid

The repair scope identifier is not valid or is of an unknown type.

Details

Namespace

System.Fabric.Repair

Assembly

System.Fabric.dll
